subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Cornerback and kick returner Chris Carr joined Tennessee when Oakland declined to match the Titans’ offer sheet. The Titans signed Carr, a restricted free agent, a week ago. The Titans said Saturday that the Raiders had declined to match the offer sheet. Carr is the Raiders’ career leader in kickoff return yards with 4,841.
